topic.title: Comic Books
topic.body:
Comic books come in these formats .cbz, .cbr, and .cbt 

they are just zip rar and tar files and you can rename the files ext and the file still works... but what I'm saying is to please allow these files types. thank you.

.cbz (zip)
.cbr (rar)
.cbt (tar)
topic.body_p:
Comic books come in these formats .cbz, .cbr, and .cbt they are just zip rar and tar files and you can rename the files ext and the file still works... but what I'm saying is to please allow these files types. thank you..cbz (zip)
.cbr (rar)
.cbt (tar)

topic.title: Controller support for games
topic.body: I'm not sure what emulators IFS supports. Controller support would be awesome. It's not hard to do. If you need help with it message me.
topic.body_p: I'm not sure what emulators IFS supports. Controller support would be awesome. It's not hard to do. If you need help with it message me.

topic.title: Faster Multi File Uploads
topic.body:
Is it possible to change the updating peers to wait until all files in the list are processed?
i uploaded a few hundred files the other day. I uploaded them 20 at a time because everything would fail and get hungup if tried to push it any further. Each file was only a few kb in size. i would say it took about 5 to 10 min to finish those 20 files.

I'm not complaining at all. IFS is pretty awesome. i just think it's possible to do a thousand files regardless of size in just a few seconds if peer updates waited until the files are processed and chunks where set.
topic.body_p: Is it possible to change the updating peers to wait until all files in the list are processed?i uploaded a few hundred files the other day. I uploaded them 20 at a time because everything would fail and get hungup if tried to push it any further. Each file was only a few kb in size. i would say it took about 5 to 10 min to finish those 20 files.I'm not complaining at all. IFS is pretty awesome. i just think it's possible to do a thousand files regardless of size in just a few seconds if peer updates waited until the files are processed and chunks where set.

comment.body: Did you have any luck submitting a comment?
comment.body_p: Did you have any luck submitting a comment?

comment.body:
That is weird. I like where IFS is going. I was thinking about trying something similar. I found a really good multi emulator with gamepad support called neptun.js 

http://neptunjs.xyz

i found a copy on github unobfuscated and found that it's based off of mame and emsripten. apparently mame took over jsmess and from the documentation compiling a emulator in javascript isn't that hard. making a UI for it is probably the hard part.
comment.body_p: That is weird. I like where IFS is going. I was thinking about trying something similar. I found a really good multi emulator with gamepad support called neptun.js http://neptunjs.xyzi found a copy on github unobfuscated and found that it's based off of mame and emsripten. apparently mame took over jsmess and from the documentation compiling a emulator in javascript isn't that hard. making a UI for it is probably the hard part.
